title: Not high enough level to comment.
body: I am level 30 but I cannot comment on the boards. It keeps saying that I need to be level 6 to comment.  Can this be fixed?

replies.body: Sometimes your account needs to sync with the boards, especially if you are posting for the first time.  It looks like your post has updated your profile!  Let me know if you have any issues posting at this point!  Welcome to the boards!
